report_title: KJET Kajiado County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Private company, registered over 5 years, excellent governance and compliance track record.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Superior financial health with turnover of KES 14.0M (≥KES 10M range) and strong cash flow.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Secured supply contracts to major supermarkets and schools in the Nairobi Metro Area.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Highly viable, costed proposal for acquiring UHT processing line to capture the long-life milk market.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Critical value-addition/processing node in the Dairy Value Chain (Priority VC).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Adopted one major green practice (wastewater treatment for irrigation); high youth employment.

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: MSME Association registered since 2021 (1-3 years operational).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Moderate financial position, turnover of KES 4.5M (KES 1M–<5M range).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: High demand from regional handicraft market and leather goods exporters.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan to acquire and install specialized camel leather processing machines and tools.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Critical manufacturing/tanning role in the Leather Value Chain (BETA Priority).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Qualifies as Woman-led; adopted 2+ green practices (uses only vegetable-based tannins; utilizes solar power for small-scale machinery).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative registered over 5 years, good member base and operational history.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Stable financial health, turnover of KES 7.0M (KES 5M–<10M range).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Strong local demand, but high competition from large quarry operators near Kitengela.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan to acquire a modern stone crushing and sorting machine for higher-value aggregates.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Directly supports the Construction Priority Value Chain (BETA).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Moderate inclusion; adopted one verifiable green practice (dust suppression and water conservation measures).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Small-scale operation, turnover of KES 2.5M (KES 1M–<5M range).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Local demand for sunflower oil; high distribution logistics cost to other markets.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan to acquire a new, larger hydraulic press to increase capacity.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Critical processing role in the Edible Oils Value Chain (Priority VC).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Moderate inclusion; adopted one green practice (sells press cake as animal feed).

ineligible_applicants.reason: The cooperative's primary business is focused on **Livestock Trading/Marketing** (primary production/commerce), which is not a designated manufacturing, processing, or value-addition priority value chain for the KJET program.
